question: Which of the following statements is correct about the recently launched SAMEEP programme?
option1: It aims at improving the living condition and education levels of orphan and vulnerable children in the country.
option2: It aims to promote Indian foreign policy and its global engagements to students across the country.
option3: It intends to establish a mechanism to connect the government directly with citizens by running mailer, outbound dialing and SMS campaigns.
option4: It aims to facilitate the rural poor with legal advice in civil matters.
answer: It aims to promote Indian foreign policy and its global engagements to students across the country.
explanation: The ministry of external affairs has launched the SAMEEP programme. SAMEEP stands for Students and Ministry of External Affairs Engagement Programme. The programme aims to promote Indian foreign policy and its global engagements to students across the country. The officers associated with the MEA will travel to their hometown and particularly to their alma mater and educate the students at school and college levels about the Indian Foreign Policy, its engagements with countries on different matters and the way in which diplomacy is in actual conducted.
